story_start:
You are a gay retard in the kingdom of Flowershit. You do nothing in order to survive but your mission is to be the laziest person there is"

The man looks at you and then turns away from his computer screen, he doesn't want to talk anymore. He walks out of the room without looking back. The door closes behind him
actions: > You you follow him into the room to see what hes up to.
results: You walk into the room and see that its empty. The man has left, so you decide to go on with your life
